name: SMRTDTA_ELEM_RESULT_CNCT
description: This table is a bridge between result contact context SmartData element values and the source result record contacts.

columns.name: HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the value record.

columns.name: FINDING_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the result contact that is associated with the SmartData element value. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the linked result record that is associated with the SmartData element value.

columns.name: ELEMENT_ID
columns.description: The SmartData identifier (SDI) for this row.
